text: The Kord is a Russian heavy machine gun. It entered service in 1998. It is is used in various countries for military and security purposes. The Kord machine gun is a 12.7mm caliber firearm that can fire up to 600-750 rounds per minute. It has an effective range of up to 2,000 meters and its weight is approximately 25 kg. In addition, it has an air cooling system and can be mounted on different platforms, such as vehicles or tripods. The Kord machine gun has been used in various conflicts and wars around the world, primarily by the armed forces of Russia and other countries that have acquired it. Some examples of conflicts in which the Kord machine gun has been used include the war in Chechnya, the war in Afghanistan, and the war in Syria. Category:Heavy machine guns Category:Machine guns
title: Kord machine gun
